name: Overview

[{"id":"09cfef79-7326-4a24-8b0d-e7f1d0b1d8b6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: iSDefiInScope","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d86cbf7b-448d-411a-b727-c0c1f0c57113","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iSDefiInScope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a validation utility used to determine whether a specific ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object is officially registered within a given ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It performs a direct comparison between a target definition and every definition currently held by the scope to confirm ownership or membership.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f0416acf-35d2-4312-8efc-110cd8672edf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In static analysis, scope management is critical for determining variable visibility and assignment logic. This function is particularly important when analyzing assignments inside conditional branches (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if/else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). If a variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is assigned a value inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block, the analyzer needs to know: "Was ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" already defined in this specific ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope, or does it belong to a parent scope?"","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd994493-2700-4b2f-a640-43a9d7e33ded","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is in the local scope, the update is direct.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"31902625-fe13-4c64-8f00-066733e46215","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is NOT in the local scope (i.e., it belongs to a parent), the change must be recorded as a "side effect" in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to be merged later. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iSDefiInScope","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides the check necessary to make this decision.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"21f3e6ac-b43d-442e-a654-68a4fbcb5776","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5e476bfb-d9d4-48aa-9dc0-2dbaa134bae3","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Object Retrieval:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It fetches the formal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object based on the provided namespaces.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"09e2d2ce-c878-4bc4-98db-82804638bb8a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterative Search:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It loops through all definitions contained within the scope (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scope.get_defs()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"92d7c95d-6eb7-44e4-a551-3a23db756938","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Comparison:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It compares the provided ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object against each definition in the scope's list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"06ec6958-9f50-477e-b44c-13ff7f5eabee","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Result:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" if a match is found, and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" otherwise.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"65b6b88e-282e-4ccd-81a6-20449f828415","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Consider an assignment ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id = 10","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"68b47f75-8697-4b31-909f-f9e1847ce4ef","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer has the definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5628d820-2fff-454b-a91f-df4a879c34ab","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iSDefiInScope(user_id_definition, current_if_scope)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6206579-63fe-49c1-9904-7f8c5ee394ba","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was just created for this ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" block, the function returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9c4a3355-f0d6-46de-96fb-90837409207e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user_id","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was actually defined at the top of the file, the function returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b52250c-cd60-4978-860a-a3ce90a699ca","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Based on this ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" result, the analyzer knows to treat this assignment as a conditional change to a global variable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0dac0f39-f962-4cb0-86be-bd89874a3efc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
